pages.title: Channel Tuners
pages.text: Sometimes it can be painstaking to go and change every single radio block to a certain channel, especially for note block songs. So to make things easier, you can use a channel tuner. Right-click on a radio block to change the channel to the tuner's channel. Right-click anywhere else to increase the tuner's channel. Sneak to decrease.
